pongobot_1.desc_unlocked: Bot grew up in a small town, where he was bullied for his flashing face and floating arms. He hid in the corner of an arcade.
pongobot_1.title: Pongobot 1

pongobot_2.desc_unlocked: Mistaking him for a game, the local kids came to play â€“ each time they loaded Pong, Bot made it cooler, faster, more fun, using his imagination. When they realized it was Bot, he was hailed a human hero.
pongobot_2.title: Pongobot 2
